headline: Voltagrid and Halliburton Make 400 MW Power Commitment to Accelerate Data Center Growth in the Eastern Hemisphere
summary: HOUSTON, December 11, 2025--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) and VoltaGrid today announced a significant milestone in their strategic collaboration. The companies have secured manufacturing for 400 megawatts (MW) of modular natural gas power systems for delivery in 2028 to support the development of data centers across the Eastern Hemisphere.
